amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to provide electronic notifications to the Committee on Agriculture of the House of Representatives on travel relating to "know your farmer, know your food" initiatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to provide electronic notifications to the Committee on Agriculture of the House of Representatives on travel relating to "know your farmer, know your food".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree (ME) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 238 (Roll no. 437).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pingree (ME) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 238 (Roll no. 437).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Ms. Pingree (ME).
